sorular.soru: Are you allowed to continue driving when the light turns yellow and you are able to stop safely?

feedback.metin: When the light turns from green to yellow, you must stop. Only when you cannot stop safely, you are allowed to drive on.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to turn here?

feedback.metin: Reversing, turning, and waiting are forbidden on autowegen and motorways, regardless of how much space you have, how busy it is, and what kind of axis line (broken or solid) splits the road.

sorular.soru: Can you let someone else drive your trailer if it is not in proper working order?

feedback.metin: If your trailer does not meet the permanent requirements, you are not allowed to drive it yourself and you may not allow anyone else to drive it either.

sorular.soru: Which lighting should you use here?

feedback.metin: On this dark road, your visibility is obstructed and you are not easily visible to other road uses. You must use dipped headlights here to improve your visibility and so that other road users can see you. When visibility is obstructed during daytime, you must use dipped headlights.

sorular.soru: It is 1:00 PM. How fast are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: You are driving on a motorway with a speed limit of 100 km/h at this time of the day. The lower sign indicates a speed limit of 90 km/h when the road surface is wet.

sorular.soru: Should you expect brommobielen on the carriageway?

feedback.metin: You can expect brommobielen on the carriageway. You are outside a built-up area, as indicated by the fact that the priority road sign is positioned after the side road. Brommobielen are allowed to drive inside and outside built-up areas, as long as this is not prohibited by signs. Brommobielen are not allowed to drive on, for example, autowegen or motorways.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to overtake like this?

feedback.metin: You are unable to see any oncoming vehicles. Overtaking here would be dangerous and is therefore forbidden.

sorular.soru: You want to turn left. Do you have to give way to the cyclist going straight?

feedback.metin: You have to give way to the cyclist. You and the cyclist are on the same road. Through traffic on the same road goes before traffic turning off. That is why the cyclist may go first.

sorular.soru: Should you drive in the direction indicated?

feedback.metin: The arrow on the sign indicates in which direction vehicles transporting hazardous materials should travel. You are not required to drive in the direction indicated if you are not transporting hazardous materials.

sorular.soru: What should you do in this situation?
cevaplar: Drive closely behind the vehicle and use light signals.
Indicate right and overtake on the right.
Keep your distance and wait until you can overtake on the left.
sorular.dogruCevap: Keep your distance and wait until you can overtake on the left.

feedback.metin: If you are driving behind a vehicle driving in the left lane for too long, you are not allowed to overtake on the right, nor are you allowed to use any light or sound signals. However inconvenient this may be, you must wait until the vehicle in front moves to the right and you can overtake on the left. Maintain sufficient following distance and do not tailgate.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to park here?

feedback.metin: Parking on the right-hand side of the road is prohibited. You are allowed to park on the left-hand side of the road.

sorular.soru: What is allowed here?
cevaplar: Picking up or dropping off passengers only.
Loading and unloading goods and picking up or dropping off passengers.
sorular.dogruCevap: Loading and unloading goods and picking up or dropping off passengers.

feedback.metin: The E-5 sign indicates a taxi rank, a parking place for taxis. You are not allowed to park here, but you can pick up or drop off a passenger, or load and unload goods.

sorular.soru: Should you give way to the pedestrian?

feedback.metin: Although the pedestrian is using an official pedestrian crossing, they do not have right of way. There are traffic lights, which take precedence over the traffic signs on the road surface. You have a green light, while the pedestrian has a red light and must therefore wait for the light to change.

sorular.soru: Are you overtaking correctly this way?

feedback.metin: You are not maintaining enough lateral distance while overtaking. When overtaking or passing balance vehicles such as cyclists, mopeds, and snorfietsen, it is wise to maintain a lateral gap of approximately one to one and a half metres.

sorular.soru: While waiting, when is the best time to turn off your internal combustion engine to save energy?
cevaplar: If you expect to have to wait for a while.
Only when loading or unloading goods.
sorular.dogruCevap: If you expect to have to wait for a while.

feedback.metin: If you have to wait in traffic for a while, it is best to switch off the engine to save energy and prevent environmental pollution. Most modern cars with internal combustion engines are equipped with a start-stop system that does this for you automatically. If your car does not have a start-stop system, you should switch off your engine if you expect to wait for a while, such as at a level crossing, on an open bridge, or in a traffic jam.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drive if you are suffering from dizziness due to the flu?

feedback.metin: If you are suffering from dizziness, driving is unwise and therefore not allowed. If you need to go somewhere, arrange for someone else to drive you there.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to enter this road?

feedback.metin: The C-5 sign indicates that entry is allowed from both sides. So you can drive here.

sorular.soru: Should you indicate if you want to leave a lay-by?

feedback.metin: Driving away from a lay-by or parking harbour is a special manoeuvre. If you want to leave one of these, you must always indicate.

sorular.soru: Can you pick up or drop off a passenger here?

feedback.metin: You are in front of an exit, where parking is prohibited â€“ even if it is your own exit. However, you may stop here for a moment to quickly pick up or drop off passengers.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to drive like this?

feedback.metin: Some cars have a removable tow bar. This tow bar must not obscure the number plate. In that case, you may only use it if you are towing a trailer or if you are using a bicycle carrier with an extra number plate. You are not allowed to drive like this.

sorular.soru: What should you do if this light comes on?
cevaplar: Drive on to a safe stop and check the oil level.
Stop immediately and check the oil level.
Drive on to a safe stop and refill the engine oil immediately.
sorular.dogruCevap: Stop immediately and check the oil level.

feedback.metin: If this light comes on, you must stop immediately. It indicates that there is a problem with the oil pressure. If you continue to drive, there is a risk that the entire engine will break down. Check the oil yourself if it is safe to do so. If you are positioned too dangerously for this, for example on the hard shoulder, call the (breakdown) emergency service.

sorular.soru: Should you give right of way to the pedestrian?

feedback.metin: The pedestrian is continuing traffic on the same road that you want to turn off of. Continuing traffic on the same road has right of way over traffic leaving the road by turning left or right. The pedestrian has right of way.

sorular.soru: You transport a 7-year-old child who is 1.25 metres tall in the front seat without a child restraint system. Is that allowed?

feedback.metin: You may never transport children younger than 18 years and shorter than 1.35 metres in the front seat without a child restraint system. Not even incidentally. However, you may occasionally transport children without a child restraint system in the back seat, for example at children's parties, or if a third child restraint system no longer fits in the back seat and a third child has to be transported in the back. This child must wear the three-point seat belt.

sorular.soru: Which driving licence should you obtain to be allowed to drive a tractor?

feedback.metin: To be allowed to drive a tractor, you have to be in possession of driving licence T.

sorular.soru: Should you move to the right here?

feedback.metin: The right lane is free, so you are required to use it. You are not allowed to drive to the left unnecessarily.

sorular.soru: Are motorcyclists with sidecar allowed to enter this road?

feedback.metin: This road is closed to motorcycles, including motorcycles with sidecars. This road may be used by, for example, passenger cars, lorries, bicycles, and mopeds. Persons pushing a motorcycle on foot are also exempt from this closure, as they are classed as pedestrians.

sorular.soru: Does the use of drugs affect driving ability?

feedback.metin: Drugs have a negative effect on awareness, concentration, and perception. Driving under the influence of drugs is an offence punishable by law.

sorular.soru: Are you obligated to turn left here?

feedback.metin: This traffic controller is giving a stop signal for the traffic approaching from behind. You may turn left and right here and drive straight on.

sorular.soru: You want to take the exit. Are you allowed to overtake the traffic jam on the right here?

feedback.metin: To overtake the traffic jam on the right, you have to use the hard shoulder. This is not allowed. You must stay in the traffic jam until the block marking.

sorular.soru: What happens to the stopping distance when driving with a caravan or trailer?
cevaplar: The stopping distance remains the same.

feedback.metin: When pulling a caravan or trailer, you must take into account that your stopping distance will increase. The mass of the vehicle with a caravan or trailer attached, the road conditions, and the speed you are driving are all factors in determining the length of the stopping distance.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to enter here?

feedback.metin: Sign C-2 indicates a one-way street, where it is prohibited to enter from this side. But the supplementary plate indicates that the sign above only applies after 100 metres. So you are allowed to enter this road from this side for the first 100 metres.

sorular.soru: Which manner of pre-sorting is allowed?

feedback.metin: Pre-sorting is only allowed as in situation B. You are only allowed to pre-sort on a cycle lane with a broken line. A cycle lane with a solid line may only be used by cyclists, snorfietsers and drivers of disabled vehicles.

sorular.soru: Are you positioned correctly?

feedback.metin: Long vehicles have a large turning circle and therefore need a lot of space to get through a curve. As you have driven too far here, the bus cannot make the turn.

sorular.soru: What should you do first in the event of an accident in a tunnel?

feedback.metin: If you are involved in an accident, you must first think about your own safety. If there is smoke or fire in the tunnel, it is very dangerous. In that case, try to leave the tunnel immediately via the escape route or tunnel tube. Always pay attention to other traffic.

sorular.soru: What is the risk if you overtake here?
cevaplar: That you will not be able to see anything through the brine scattered on your windscreen.
That the driver will not see you because of the blind spot.
That you will slip because it is usually more slippery in front of the gritter.
sorular.dogruCevap: That you will not be able to see anything through the brine scattered on your windscreen.

feedback.metin: Overtaking a gritter can be unwise as sprinkled brine may end up on your windscreen and temporarily block your vision. The belief that the road in front of the gritter is more slippery than behind it is incorrect. The gritted brine only works after it has been driven over and only after some time.

sorular.soru: Is merging a special manoeuvre?

feedback.metin: When you drive from the merge lane onto the main carriageway, you are performing a special manoeuvre. You must therefore give way to all other traffic on the carriageway. You must also use your turn lights to indicate your intention to merge.

sorular.soru: What is the correct way for a pregnant woman to wear a three-point seat belt?

feedback.metin: It is important for a seat belt to be worn properly and tightly. If the belt is too loose, the sternum and ribs may break upon impact in the event of an accident. An incorrectly-placed belt can also cause a range of injuries. If you place the hip belt too high, there is a risk of slipping under the belt. Pregnant women in particular should wear the hip section of the belt as low as possible to prevent abdominal injuries in the event of an accident.

sorular.soru: In what situation should you give way to the pedestrian?

feedback.metin: Relative to you, the pedestrian is coming from the left (situation A) or the right (situation B) on the intersecting road. They are not on the same road as you. You are approaching priority triangles. These mean: give way to drivers on the intersecting road. Because a pedestrian is not a driver, you do not have to give way to them.

sorular.soru: You are almost out of petrol and have just passed the petrol station. Are you allowed to reverse?

feedback.metin: Reversing is always prohibited on autowegen and motorways. If you run out of petrol and cannot get to the next petrol station, leave the motorway via the next available exit. If you cannot get to the exit, park your vehicle safely and seek help.

sorular.soru: What part of the road is called a carriageway?

feedback.metin: Central verges, hard shoulders, parking lanes, paths, verges, and side roads are part of the road, but are not part of the carriageway. They are not intended for moving vehicles.

sorular.soru: What is the permissible width of a passenger car including a divisible load?

feedback.metin: A passenger car may never be wider than the maximum allowed width of the vehicle itself, including any load that is divisible in width. Cargo may protrude no more than 20 cm on each side.
